about_the_game:
Try out Pellet Dodge before you buy for free. This Demo has, compared to the full game;
- 2 Areas (8 levels) out of 10+ (40+... more coming soon!) normally in the Base Game.
- Unlimited access to Endless Mode

Things you can't do in the Demo:
- Collect coins or upgrade your Ship
- Customize your Ship
- Play all sorts of other gamemodes/minigames
- Play Co-Op Multiplayer with friends (Coming Soon in the Base Game)
- And of course, complete the game. No seriously; the rest just isn't in the game... this isn't like [REDACTED] Arcade or anything that contains the full game and you just buy a license to continue playing after reaching a stop point. No. Not like that at all. Because this is S T E A M.
detailed_description:
Try out Pellet Dodge before you buy for free. This Demo has, compared to the full game;
- 2 Areas (8 levels) out of 10+ (40+... more coming soon!) normally in the Base Game.
- Unlimited access to Endless Mode

Things you can't do in the Demo:
- Collect coins or upgrade your Ship
- Customize your Ship
- Play all sorts of other gamemodes/minigames
- Play Co-Op Multiplayer with friends (Coming Soon in the Base Game)
- And of course, complete the game. No seriously; the rest just isn't in the game... this isn't like [REDACTED] Arcade or anything that contains the full game and you just buy a license to continue playing after reaching a stop point. No. Not like that at all. Because this is S T E A M.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or a 64-bit Linux Distro.
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS or a 64-bit Linux Distro.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband Internet connection required for Steam features such as Leaderboards.

name: Pellet Dodge Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband Internet connection required for Steam features such as Leaderboards.

short_description: A taste of Space and Geometrical Corruption.
